column4: Nothing big or system-killing, but I suspect it's holding back my performance.
How do I determine whether my AGP controller is supported?
Can anyone help me determine whether AGP is properly functional on my system?
wj32's got the magic ticket if you can't make it happen elsewise.
No idea about wmode, I'm tech-savvy but new at a lot of this myself.  Can't wait to see what a doofus I look like when I install Slackware on my more powerful system... :-\
I repeat until someone responds directly to the question:  Is there an easy way to determine whether AGP support is properly functional on my system?
if you were looking to play Doom 3 using software rendering...
So am I.  Umm... ungod bless you.
